MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 07-DEC-2020 15:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the G11 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Partickhill Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.54am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair we now require further resource on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.45am on Monday 7th December 2020.
